title: Impact of compliance with European Union (EU) regulations on the income of actors along the cocoa supply chain in Osun state, Nigeria
content:
Publication date: December 2023

Source: Sustainable Futures, Volume 6

Author(s): Yewande Bobola Akande, Akeem Abiade Tijani, Ayodeji Damilola Kehinde, Lawrence Oluwagbenga Oyenpemi
